name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: Learn the fundamentals of creative writing, including character development, plot, and writing techniques.

name: Humor Writing Basics
description: Learn the basics of writing comedic material, including writing for stand-up, sketches, and short stories.

name: Advanced Humor Writing
description: Learn more advanced humor writing techniques, such as satire, parody, puns, and wordplay.

name: Humor Writing in Film & Television
description: Learn how to write comedic material for film and television, including writing scripts and treatments.
